```{python}
from pynsee.download import load_data
from pynsee.geodata import get_geodata
import geopandas as gpd
```

```{python}
df = load_data("FILOSOFI_COM", date = "2015")
```

```{python}
com = get_geodata('ADMINEXPRESS-COG-CARTO.LATEST:commune')
```

```{python}
mapcom = gpd.GeoDataFrame(com).set_crs("EPSG:3857")
```

```{python}
mapcom.loc[mapcom['insee_reg'] == "11"].merge(df, left_on = "insee_com", right_on = "CODGEO").plot(column = "MED15")
```
